name: Shorter Live Bookmark Feeds
description: Limit the number of RSS items in a live bookmark to an arbitrary number (default 14)
additional_info: You don't have to install stylish or add other junk to make this work...you can instead just paste the CSS into your Firefox profile's userChrome.css file. Whatever number you want to show, put it in the script at nth-child(n+[yournumber+1]). This script improves on style 7942 by keeping the Open "Sitename" link at the bottom, and using a more efficient single selector instead of hiding all and then re-showing the number required one at a time with long, clumsy selectors.
css:
/* limit the number of items in live bookmarks */
[livemark="true"] menuitem:not([label^="Open \""]):nth-child(n+15) { display: none !important; }
